views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 6, 7, 8, 9.3


Having troubles keeping your favorite emojis in your keyboard? With this tweak you can set custom emojis for the frequently used emoji category. Incase you don't use all 30 maximum characters the rest will be most frequently used.

If users are installing on iOS 6 devices please haveinstalled to fix layout issues.

This tweak would not be possible without the help from @PoomSmart

Configure options from Settings app

fixed compiling errors for older iOS Version: 1.0.2
- Fixes Twitter share prefs crash

Version: 1.0.1
- Correct iOS 10 support Thanks PoomSmart
- iOS 6, 7, 8, 9 support added Thanks PoomSmart
